text: Cryptocheiridium is a genus of pseudoscorpions in the family Cheiridiidae. Cryptocheiridium lucifugum is one of the animals found in the Batu Caves, Selangor, Malaysia. †Cryptocheiridium antiquum was found in Dominican amber (Miocene of Dominican Republic). == References == == External links == * Cryptocheiridium at Biolib * Cryptocheiridium at biodiversity.org.au * Cryptocheiridium at fossilworks Category:Pseudoscorpion genera Category:Cheiridiidae
title: Cryptocheiridium
